p: Three non-typable p1 isolates were collected in 2016 and designated as strains M241, M282, and K708 (Tables 3 and 4). In the RepMP4 region analysis, these strains exhibited known PCR-RFLP patterns. The patterns of strains M282 and M241 were identical to that of type 2c strains ( Fig 2, lanes 6 and 8). Furthermore, the RepMP4 pattern of strain K708 was identical to that of type 2, 2a, or 2b strains ( Fig 2, lane 7). RepMP2/3 region patterns of these strains were however different from those of known strain types ( Fig 2, lanes 14â€“16). RepMP2/3 patterns of strains M282 and K708 were novel ( Fig 2, lanes 14 and 15). The RepMP2/3 region of strain M241 could not be analyzed due to the lack of PCR amplification when ADH3 and ADH4 primers were used ( Fig 2, lane 16).
